Iris:
The Water Spirit Queen was quite beautiful, but here expression was like that of an evil witch. I was so terrified, I ran away after memorizing the location, but it still give me chills. The Water Spirit Queen’s, name is Queen Nebula. There are no stories of her abilities or strength, so I cannot speak of them. You will have to find out for yourself.
I can send you there because I remember the location, but you mustn’t go alone. If you don’t prepare adequately, you will surely meet disaster.
You can also test your skills in the even harder challenge, the Epic Battle.
(An alliance of at least 27 may enter. To participate in the Epic Battle, you must be above Lv 80).
